Class Jugador

java.lang.Object
CLASES.Jugador
public class Jugador extends Object
The Jugador class represents a player in the game. It contains attributes such as id, name, position, money, owned properties, and whether the player is imprisoned. It also provides methods to move the player and manage their properties.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor that initializes the player with all attributes.
    Jugador(String nombre)
    Constructor that initializes the player with a name.

  • Constructor Details

    • Jugador

      public Jugador()
      Default constructor that initializes the player with default values.

    • Jugador

      public Jugador(String nombre)
      Constructor that initializes the player with a name.
      Parameters:
      nombre - the name of the player

    • Jugador

      public Jugador(int id, int p_ganadas, String nombre, int posicion, int dinero, ArrayList<Calle> calles, boolean encarcelado)
      Constructor that initializes the player with all attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the player
      p_ganadas - the number of games won by the player
      nombre - the name of the player
      posicion - the current position of the player on the board
      dinero - the amount of money the player has
      calles - the list of properties owned by the player
      encarcelado - whether the player is imprisoned or not

    • isEncarcelado

      public boolean isEncarcelado()
      Returns whether the player is imprisoned or not.
      Returns:
      true if the player is imprisoned, false otherwise

      public void setEncarcelado(boolean encarcelado)
      Sets whether the player is imprisoned or not.
      Parameters:
      encarcelado - true to mark the player as imprisoned, false otherwise

    • mover

      public void mover(int num)
      Moves the player a certain number of spaces on the board. If the player passes the last space (27), they receive 200€.
      Parameters:
      num - the number of spaces to move

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Jugador object.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string containing the player's id and name
